banking-assistant.title: Intelligent Banking Assistant for Finantial Services
banking-assistant.description: A banking assistant that delivers personalized financial advice, transaction analysis, and fraud detection!!!

biometric-security-system.title: Biometric Security System
biometric-security-system.description: An advanced identity verification AI that uses facial recognition, fingerprint analysis, and behavioral biometrics to provide secure access control and threat detection!

cloud-cost-optimizer.title: Cloud Cost Optimizer
cloud-cost-optimizer.description: An intelligent cloud management platform that monitors resource usage, identifies cost savings opportunities, and automatically optimizes cloud infrastructure spending!

content-moderation-agent.title: Content Moderation Agent
content-moderation-agent.description: An AI content moderator that automatically reviews user-generated content, detects harmful material, and ensures platform safety across social media and forums!
